title: YOUWCHY THE STABBER
body:
New champion idea

Passive:
Part 1:Damaging enemy makes them leave a puddle of blood on the ground
Part 2:Making an enemy bleed also leaves a trail of blood drops for 5 seconds that you can see

Q:Youwchy stabs with an upward thrust, low cooldown, high damage but very short range
W:Youwchy spins his knife for 3 seconds and takes slightly more damage, the extra damage taken applies to his knifes next Q or R (up to a cap)
E:Youwchy leaps from a blood puddle within range (slight more range than ult)  and kocks nearby enemies back
R:Youwchy throws his knife 1000 units and the enemy screams "YOUWWWCHHH!!!"

Lore:Youwchy was the a fishsalesman in butchers bridge when one day some thieves tried to take money from his store. He stabbed them all super hard and then they died. Ever since then Youwchy gave up gutting fishe to go and become the best stabber their is. He really is motivated by his boredom and dislike of all those new anime and disney champions riot put in the game and wants to be totally cool and not like those guys.

Well what do you think guys??? This is an entirely serious post and I really spent a lot of time on this. Haven't come up with ability numbers yet.
